98828.「こちらは バトルロードコインの\n 景品交換所になりますっ。\n どの景品を:
This is the prize exchange for Battle Road
Coins... Which prize are you looking for?<break>

100158.「ほかに 交換したい景品は ありますかっ？\n<end>:
Is there anything else you'd like?
<end>

100159.「ほかに 交換したい景品は ありますかっ？\n<end>:
Is there anything else you'd like?
<end>

100160.「あれれっ？ <%sL_BAG_TYPE>がいっぱいで\n <%sM_item>:
Huh? Looks like your <%sL_BAG_TYPE>
is full, so you can't carry that.
<bw_break>

100161.「ああっ！？ す すみません……。\n うまく 交換できなかったみたいです。\n:
What?! I'm s-sorry... something went wrong
with the exchange. Can you try again in a
minute?
<end>

100162.「すみません。<%sM_item>は これ以上\n 交換できないんです。\n 他:
Sorry, but I can't exchange for any more of
the <%sM_item>. Is there
anything else you'd like instead?
<bw_break>

100163.「ありがとうございました！\n ジャンジャン バトルに勝って\n また 来てくだ:
Thank you very much! Go win some exciting
battles and come back anytime!
<turn end>

100164.「ほかに 交換したい景品は ありますかっ？\n<end>:
Is there anything else you'd like?
<end>

100165.「はいっ <%sM_item>ですね！\n では バトルロードコイン <%nM_:
Yes, the <%sM_item>! That'll
be <%dM_Num> Battle Road Coins.
<yesno><break>

100166.「はいっ <%sM_item> <%nL_KAUKAZU>個ですね！\n では:
Yes, <%dL_KAUKAZU> <%sM_item>! That'll
be <%dM_Num> Battle Road Coins, please.
<yesno><break>

100169.「あれれっ？ その景品を交換するには\n バトルロードコインが 足りないみたいで:
Huh? You don't have enough Battle Road Coins
for that.
<bw_break>

100190.「その景品を交換するには\n ランクが まだ足りないみたいですっ。\n ランクを:
Your rank isn't high enough to receive that.
Please raise your rank first, and then
come back to me, okay?
<bw_break>

102681.「ここでは バトルロードに参加して手に入る\n バトルロードコインと 豪華景品を:
Here you can use your earned Battle Road Coins to exchange for a variety of neat prizes.
Also, the higher your rank, the more prizes you'll have access to, so make sure to win lots of battles to raise it. Now then...

102987.「あっ <%sM_item>は すでに\n 読んだことがあるみたいですが\n そ:
Seems you've already read that. Do you still
want it?
<yesno><break>

103164.「モンスター格闘場の石は モンスター格闘場\n 専用のルーラストーンになります。:
The Monster Arena stone is one that's set to this location, and can't be rewritten at a church.
You'd like to exchange <%dM_Num> of your Battle Road Coins for it?

113283.<color_yellow>\n絆のエンブレムの説明です。\n絆のエンブレムは:
This will explain the Bonding Emblem. It is an accessory exclusive to fellow monsters that uses the Proof accessory slot.
When your monster has it equipped, your tension will sometimes increase by 1 level whenever you trigger a bond effect.
A bond effect can happen regardless if your monster is in Active or Standby status, but it will only happen if they are alive.
The higher your monster's happiness level, the more likely a bond effect will occur.
